assert(x + y == n); // Line A
assert(n == x + z); // Line B
assert(y + z == n); // Line C
assert(x + y == 0 || (x+y) >= n && (x+y) <= 2*n ); // line D

assert(x + y == n); // Line A
assert(n == (x+z)); // Line B
assert(y + z == n); // Line C
assert(x + y == n); // Line D

assert(y + x == n); // line A
assert(z + x == n && y == n - z); // line B
assert(z + y == n && x == 0); // line C
assert(x >= 0 && y <= n); // line D

assert(n == (x + y)); // Line A
assert(y == (x + z)); // Line B
assert(z == 0);       // Line C
assert(x == 0 && n==y );   // Line D
